CSSFilter.summary: The filter CSS property applies graphical effects like blur or color shift to an element. Filters are commonly used to adjust the rendering of images, backgrounds, and borders.

remarks.para: Several functions, such as blur() and contrast(), are available to help you achieve predefined effects.
